attributes.title: VERY disappointed
attributes.review: I got this app hoping it would bring me closer to my wonderful  first ✨ orange ✨ President 💖🧚🏼‍♂️ I am very disappointed.
I got the app trying to support my favorite Cheeto but like no the app wouldn’t let me and I want to speak to a manager

attributes.title: horrible app
attributes.review: horrible app it did nothing it was supposed to it also shut down my phone every time i tried to open it when i did get it open the cheeto man was there🤮this app is just the worst app i’ve ever seen

attributes.review: It literally takes so much time to download

attributes.review: It’s time for this racist, homophobic, rapist to get out of office. Also the app crashes and gave me a virus or whatever

attributes.title: Trump app
attributes.review: I am very disappointed. This app is not giving the information it promised. Terrible. Horrible. I’m done.

attributes.title: SOOO HORRIBLE 。💩💩😡😡😡🤯

attributes.title: Disgusting ✨
attributes.review: I downloaded the app so I could support our non-homophobic, non-racist president and saw a disgusting photo of a spray tanned rat. I highly recommend NOT downloading ✨🧚‍♀️

attributes.title: don’t ban tiktok we won’t ban your app
attributes.review: hi i’m from tiktok trump wants to ban tiktok so the more stupid stuff he wants to do the more stupid stuff we are going to do so here trump if your reading this i want you to not ban tiktok from the usa and we won’t keep messing with you. i think it’s a good deal am i right
